Translations.Text: Dayavana (rahamana) ne
Kura'ana sikavile
Tyaneca manavala nirmana kele
Tyala bolane sikavile
Surya ani candra (nirdharita) hisobace palana karatata
Ani tare va vrksa doghe sajada karatata
Tyaneca akasala unca kele ani tyaneca tula (taraju) rakhali
Yasathi ki tumhi tolanyata maryadece ullanghana na karave
Ani n'yayasaha tola ucita rakha ani tolanyata kami de'u naka
Ani tyaneca srstikarita jaminila bichavile
Jicyata meve aheta ani gucchancya khajurice vrksa aheta
Ani bhusedara dhan'ya ahe ani sugandhita phule aheta
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyane manavala khanakhananarya matipasuna nirmana kele, ji thikarisarakhi hoti
Ani jinnanna agnisikhepasuna nirmana kele
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
To donhi purvanca ani donhi pascimanca svami ahe
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyane dona samudra pravahita kele je ekamekasa milatata
Tya doghancya daramyana eka ada (padada) ahe ki tyapudhe ja'u sakata nahita
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya doghammadhuna moti ani pravala nighatata
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Ani allahacyaca (adhikarakakseta) aheta ti jahaje, ji samudrata parvatansarakhi unca (ubhi) calata aheta
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Jaminivara je kahi ahe te sarva nasa pavanare ahe
Kevala tumacya palanakartyace mukha (astitva), jo motha mahana ani pratistha balaganara ahe, baki rahila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Akasammadhye va jaminivara je je aheta sarva tyacyacakade yacana karatata, pratyeka divasa to eka karyata ahe
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
(He jinna ani manavancya samuhanno!) Lavakaraca amhi tumacyakade purnatah laksa kendrita karu
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala

(He jinna ani manavancya samuhanno!) Jara tumacyata akasancya ani dharaticya kinarya (sima) bahera nighanyace samarthya ahe, tara nighuna ja (tathapi) varcasva ani samarthyavina tumhi nighu sakata nahi
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tumacyavara agice nikhare ani dhura sodala ja'ila, maga tumhi samana karu sakanara nahita
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Maga jevha akasa vidirna ho'una lala ho'ila, janu lala camade asave
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya divasi konatyahi manavala ani konatyahi jinnala tyacya aparadhanvisayi vicarana keli janara nahi
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Aparadhi loka kevala apalya ceharya-moharyavarunaca olakhale jatila ani tyancya kapalace kesa va paya dharale jatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Hica ti jahannama ahe, jila aparadhi khote manata hote
Ticya garama ukalatya panyacya daramyana phera khatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Ani tya manasakarita, jo apalya palanakartyasamora ubhe rahanyasa ghabarala, dona jannata aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Donhihi jannati aneka sakha asalelya aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya donhi jannatimmadhye dona vahate jhare aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya donhim (jannatim) madhye pratyeka mevyace dona prakara asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Jannatamadhye rahanare asa bichayatinvara takke lavuna basatila, jyance astara jada resamace asela ani tya donhi jannatinci phale (meve) khupa javala asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tithe (lajalu) khali najara thevanarya hura (parya) aheta, jyanna tyancyapurvi konatyahi jinna ani manavane hata lavala nasela
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya (hura-parya) manika (yakuta) ani pravalasarakhya asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Bhalepanaca mobadala, bhalepanasivaya dusara kaya ahe
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Ani tyacyakherija dona jannati anakhi aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Donhi gadhahiravya rangacya
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyancyata dona (vegane) ucambalanare jhare aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya doghammadhye meve anakhi khajuri va dalimba asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyancyata satsila caritryavana sundara striya aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
(Gauravarniya) hura (parya) jannatacya khemyammadhye rahanarya aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyam (hura - parya) na konatyahi manava ani jinnane yapurvi hata lavala nahi (sparsahi kela nahi)
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Hiravya gadya ani sundara bichan'yanvara takke lavuna basale asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Mothe subha (ani samrd'dhasali) ahe tumacya palanakartyace nava, jo motha pratapasali ani motha
